summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Twenty Thousand dollars from the General Fund of the City of Seattle as a temporary loan to Local Improvement Fund No. 3005, Ordinance No. 36184, for the improvement of Forty-seventy Avenue Southwest, et al, said money to be used by the Board of Public Work for the completion for the improvement of the streets as ordered by said Ordinance No. 36184, and to be repaid to the General Fund from the first moneys belonging to said district and available for that purpose.
